rules_text:
[i]Augmented[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, untap up to one target land you control. It becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature that's all colors and gains haste and vigilance until end of turn. It's still a land.
{T}: Untap target land. It gains all basic land types until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“As you learn, you get smaller while the world gets big.”[/i]
notes:
Bastard — Ben Folds
